text: Abercegir () is a small rural village in Powys, Wales. It lies approximately 4 miles east of the town of Machynlleth and is 81 miles (131 km) from Cardiff and 172 miles (277 km) from London. == External links == * *Photos of Abercegir and surrounding area on geograph ==References== Category:Villages in Powys Category:Glantwymyn
title: Abercegir
